duties_responsibilities.duty: Answer, screen and forward calls in a professional manner
Welcome clients and visitors at reception
Schedule and confirm client consultations and appointments
Provide basic and accurate information in-person and via phone/email
Manage incoming mail, faxes, and deliveries
Assist with copying, scanning, faxing, and emailing
Maintain office, conference rooms, and kitchen areas
Prepare conference rooms for meetings and arrange refreshments if necessary
Order, maintain and replenish office and kitchen supplies
Take out the trash and water plants
